text: Champ (October 2008 - June 19, 2021) and Major (born January 2018) are pet German Shepherds owned by former President of the United States Joe Biden and First Lady Jill Biden. Major is the first shelter dog to have lived in the White House. Champ died on June 19, 2021 at the Biden family home in Wilmington, Delaware at the age of 12. ==References== Category:Joe Biden Category:United States presidential dogs
title: Champ and Major
